item.title: Aperture Photometry
item.description:
So the code to add point sources to the maps and perform basic aperture photometry has started working to the point where I can share some results.

For maps with no underlying sky structure, only point sources, recovery is very nearly perfect, with PearsonR coefficients essentially equal to 1 until â€¦
item.dc:creator: Jared (adam.g.ginsburg@gmail.com)
